DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Sofosbuvir Combination With Daclatasvir Simeprevir 12 Weeks Non-cirrhotic Subjects Infected With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 ( TNT )
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label , single-center , head-to-head non-inferiority trial , treatment-naive pegylated interferon treatment-experienced patient GT1 infection randomize receive once-daily SOF 400 mg plus DCV 60 mg SIM 150 mg 12 week .
